SELECT
ROW_NUMBER() OVER( order by DT_REG DESC ) AS ROWNUM /* ROWNUM */
ROW_NUMBER() OVER( order by ${ORDER_COLUMN} ${ORDER_ASC} ) AS ROWNUM /* ROWNUM */
, SUB.* FROM (
SELECT B.ID_BULLETIN /* 자료실번호 */ , B.DS_TITLE /* 제목 */ , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_ATTACH A , SYS_ATTACH_LINK L WHERE A.ATTACH_ID = L.ATTACH_ID AND L.BIZ_TP= 'BBS' AND L.BIZ_KEY = B.ID_BULLETIN) AS CNT_ATTACH /* 첨부파일개수 */ , B.CNT_INQUIRY /* 조회수 */ , CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),B.DT_REG,120)+' '+CONVERT(VARCHAR(5),B.DT_REG,114) AS DT_REG /* 등록일자 */ , SUR.USER_NM AS NM_REG_EMP /* 등록자 */ , SDR.DEPT_NM AS NM_REG_DEPT /* 등록부서 */ FROM TBS_BULLETIN B LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_USER SUR ON B.ID_REG_EMP=SUR.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_DEPARTMENT SDR ON B.ID_REG_DEPT=SDR.DEPT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND B.TP_BULLETIN = '02'
AND B.DT_REG >= CAST(#{DT_REG_START} + ' 00:00:00' AS DATETIME) /* 기간검색(FROM) */
AND B.DT_REG <= CAST(#{DT_REG_END} + ' 23:59:59' AS DATETIME) /* 기간검색(TO) */
AND B.ID_REG_EMP LIKE '%' + #{ID_REG_EMP} + '%'
AND (B.DS_TITLE LIKE '%' + #{DS_TITLE_CONTENT} + '%' OR B.DS_CONTENT LIKE '%' + #{DS_TITLE_CONTENT} +'%') /* 제목+내용 */
AND B.FG_DEL = 'N'
) SUB
mapper.select: SELECT ID_BULLETIN /* 자료실번호 */ , TP_CATEGORY /* 카테고리 */ , DS_TITLE /* 제목 */ , DS_CONTENT /* 내용 */ , DS_CONT_DTL /* 상세내용 */ , DT_REG /* 최초등록일 */ , SDR.DEPT_NM AS NM_REG_DEPT /* 최초등록부서*/ , SUR.USER_NM AS NM_REG_EMP /* 최초등록자 */ , ID_REG_EMP , DT_UPT /* 최종수정일 */ , SDU.DEPT_NM AS NM_UPT_DEPT /* 최종수정부서*/ , SUU.USER_NM AS NM_UPT_EMP /* 최종수정자 */ FROM TBS_BULLETIN TB LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_DEPARTMENT SDR ON TB.ID_REG_DEPT=SDR.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_USER SUR ON TB.ID_REG_EMP=SUR.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_DEPARTMENT SDU ON TB.ID_UPT_DEPT=SDU.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_USER SUU ON TB.ID_UPT_EMP=SUU.USER_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND TP_BULLETIN = '02' /* (01:자료실) */ AND ID_BULLETIN = #{ID_BULLETIN} /* 게시판ID */
SELECT ROLE_ID FROM AP_ROLE_GROUP WHERE USER_ID=#{user.id} GROUP BY ROLE_ID
